title: The best bard skin
body: You know the best skin idea for bars would be a Flying Spaghetti Monster bard and he collects meat balls for chimes and his portal is a giant spaghetti string

replies.body: If anyone should get a Flying Spaghetti Monster skin it should be Vel'Koz

I have a good idea, it follows a skin line as well.
